Simone France Skincare Eye Candy

Brand: Simone France

Category: Around Eye Cream

Brand: Simone France

Category: Around Eye Cream

Ingredients: Water, Grape Seed Oil, Jojoba Seed Oil*, Emu Oil, Emulsifying Wax, Evening Primrose Oil*, Phenoxyethanol, Vitamin E, Witch Hazel Water*, White Willow Bark Extract*, Neem Seed Oil*, Rosemary Leaf Extract*, Xanthan Gum, Alcohol*, Tetrasodium Glutamate Diacetate.
Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Allergies & Immunotoxicity; MODERATE: Use Restrictions; LOW: Cancer, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
